summary: Completed comprehensive testing of French e-commerce music site. All core features working correctly including registration, email verification, login, catalog browsing, cart management, Stripe checkout, and user account management.

design_issues.issue: External audio preview URLs from soundhelix.com are failing to load
design_issues.note: This is expected as they are external test URLs - functionality works but audio doesn't play

design_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent components
design_issues.note: Accessibility warning only - functionality works perfectly

passed_tests: Backend API - All 14 endpoints tested successfully (100% pass rate)
Homepage loading with hero section and featured products
Product detail page with audio player interface
User registration with all required fields (pr√©nom, nom, email, adresse, mot de passe)
User login with email and password authentication
Add products to cart (requires login) - working correctly
Cart display with item count and total calculation
Stripe checkout session creation and redirection
User account page with profile information display
Order history display in user account
Navbar with cart counter and user menu
French language interface throughout the site
